review_data.title: You cannot miss the Dim Sum from uncle7!
review_data.content: With a nice surprise we discover this real Cinese restaurant in the heart of Zurich. The service is nice and the food really tasty. You cannot miss to try this restaurant and all the variety of dim sum freshly made.
